channel.title: The Test Cricket Podcast mp3
channel.description: Mark Chapman presents the Times Test Cricket podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Test Cricket Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Times Online
channel.itunes:keywords: Chappers, CMJ, cricket, India, West Indies, Hoggard, Lords, Trent Bridge, Old Trafford, The Oval, Hedingley

item.title: Episode 1
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: Christopher Martin Jenkins and Patrick Kidd from the Times join Mark to preview the competiton
item.itunes:summary: Christopher Martin Jenkins and Patrick Kidd from the Times join Mark to preview the competiton and former England cricketer Chris Adams joins us to talk one day tactics

item.title: World Cup Cricket Podcast 1 - Chris Cowdrey
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: For our opener we have Mark Chapman and joining him are CMJ and Patrick Kidd
item.itunes:summary: For our opener we have Mark Chapman and joining him are CMJ and Patrick Kidd. We also Have Chris Cowdrey, Chris Adams and a nineteen stone bowler

item.title: World Cup Cricket Podcast 2- Mark Ramprakash
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: This week CMJ and Patrick Kidd join Mark Ramprakash and John Emburey to talk falling off a pedalo, the group stage and the passing of a John Woolmer
item.itunes:summary: This week CMJ and Patrick Kidd join Mark Ramprakash and John Emburey to talk falling off a pedalo, the group stage and the passing of a John Woolmer

item.title: World Cup Cricket Podcast 3 - Mike Gatting
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: This week Mike Gatting Jack Russell Patrick Keilty and David Townsend help Mark Chapman to preview the Super 8s
item.itunes:summary: This week Mike Gatting Jack Russell Patrick Keilty and David Townsend help Mark Chapman to preview the Super 8s

item.title: World Cup Cricket Podcast 4 - Matthew Hoggard
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: This week we are joined by Matthew Hoggard and MCC Chief Keith Bradshaw
item.itunes:summary: This week we are joined by Matthew Hoggard and MMC Chief Keith Bradshaw

item.title: World Cup Cricket Podcast 5 - Garfield Sobers
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: This week we interview the legendary Carribean cricketer Garfield Sobers
item.itunes:summary: This week we interview the legendary Carribean cricketer Garfield Sobers

item.title: World Cup Cricket Podcast 6 - Phil Tufnell
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: This week Matthew Hoggard returns and we debate the dark art of sledging with Phil Tufnell
item.itunes:summary: This week Matthew Hoggard returns and we debate the dark art of sledging with Phil Tufnell

item.title: World Cup Cricket Podcast 7 - Shane Warne
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: For our final podcast we speak to the great Shane Warne about the World Cup and Hampshire
item.itunes:summary: For our final podcast we speak to the great Shane Warne about the World and we also welcome Nick Hancock into the studio

item.title: The Test Cricket Podcast 1 - Keith Bradshaw
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: For the first pod of our new series we speak to CMJ about the first test and to Keith Bradshaw about plans to redevelop Lords
item.itunes:summary: For the first pod of our new series we speak to CMJ about the first test and to Keith Bradshaw about plans to redevelop Lords

item.title: The Test Cricket Podcast 2 - Mark Ramprakash
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: On the second Test cricket podcast, Mark Ramprakash joins the boys and voices his surprise at Michael Vaughan's critique of Freddie Flintoff's pedalo incident. Christopher Martin-Jenkins also joins in and discusses the virtues of a strong county cricket championship.
item.itunes:summary: On the second Test cricket podcast, Mark Ramprakash joins the boys and voices his surprise at Michael Vaughan's critique of Freddie Flintoff's pedalo incident. Christopher Martin-Jenkins also joins in and discusses the virtues of a strong county cricket championship.

item.title: The Test Cricket Podcast 3 - Matthew Hoggard
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:summary: Hoggy phones the boys up from England training for a bit of abuse whilst Sir Trevor McDonald gives his thoughts on the demise of the West Indies

item.title: The Test Cricket Podcast 4 - Mike Gatting and Rahul Dravid
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: This week Mike Gatting and Rahul Dravid join Mark Chapman Patrick Kidd and Christopher Martin Jenkins
item.itunes:summary: This week Mike Gatting and Rahul Dravid join Mark Chapman Patrick Kidd and Christopher Martin Jenkins

item.title: The Test Cricket Podcast 5 - Matthew Hoggard
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: This week Hoggy returns to talk about Englands draw against India and Ivo Tennant talks about the MMCs possible move into North America
item.itunes:summary: This week Hoggy returns to talk about Englands draw against India and Ivo Tennant talks about the MMCs possible move into North America

item.title: The Test Cricket Podcast 6 – Ronnie Irani
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:summary: Chappers and the team are joined by Ronnie Irani to look back at the series defeat against India

item.title: The Bodyline Tour A Cricket Podcast Special
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: To commemorate the bodyline tour of 1932 and 1933 Mark Chapman and Patrick Kidd talk to Christopher Martin Jenkins and Murray Hatchcock about the most infamous Ashes tour
item.itunes:summary: To commemorate the bodyline tour of 1932 and 1933 Mark Chapman and Patrick Kidd talk to Christopher Martin Jenkins and Murray Hatchcock about the most infamous Ashes tour

item.title: Wisden 2008 - A Cricket Podcast Special Part One
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: Wisden editor Scyld Berry and CMJ Simon Barnes Patrick Kidd of the Times debate who should be Wisdens cricketers of the year
item.itunes:summary: Wisden editor Scyld Berry and CMJ Simon Barnes Patrick Kidd of the Times debate who should be Wisdens cricketers of the year

item.title: Wisden 2008 - A Cricket Podcast Special Part Two
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: In the second of our Wisden specials we debate the state of cricket today along with announcing the Wisden Cricketers of the Year
item.itunes:summary: In the second of our Wisden specials we debate the state of cricket today along with announcing the Wisden Cricketers of the Year

item.title: Test Cricket Podcast 1 - Shane Bond and Mike Atherton
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: Mark Chapman and company speak to Kiwi Shane Bond
item.itunes:summary: This week Mark Chapman and company speak to Kiwi Shane Bond about the IPL and Mike Atherton discusses Englands chance ahead of the first Test

item.title: Test Cricket Podcast 2 - Gatting and Hoggard
item.itunes:author: Times Onlnie
item.itunes:summary: Mark Chapman and the Times team chat to Mike Gatting and Matthew Hoggard about Englands Test so far
item.itunes:keywords: Test Cricket Podcast 2 - Gatting and Hoggard

item.title: Test Cricket Podcast 3 - Mark Ramprakash
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: This week the Surrey batsman talks about trying for his hundredth hundred and we preview the third test against New Zealand
item.itunes:summary: This week the Surrey batsman talks about trying for his hundredth hundred and we preview the third test against New Zealand

item.title: Test Cricket Podcast 4 - Ronnie Irani
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: Ronnie Irani tells the team how he helped Dale Steyn become the best bowler in the world Plus Andy Zaltzman compares the England Selectors consistency over this year to a poor curry recipe
item.itunes:summary: Ronnie Irani tells the team how he helped Dale Steyn become the best bowler in the world Plus Andy Zaltzman compares the England Selectors consistency over this year to a poor curry recipe

item.title: Test Cricket Podcast 5 - Shaun Pollack
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: We review the first test and preview the second against South Africa who fought back for a draw at Lords and we find out more connections with desperate housewives and cricket
item.itunes:summary: We review the first test and preview the second against South Africa who fought back for a draw at Lords and we find out more connections with desperate housewives and cricket

item.title: Test Cricket Podcast 6 - Keith Bradshaw
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: This week Times Cricket correspondent Mike Atherton on the England selection debacle we preview the Third Test against South Africa at Edgbaston and Keith Bradshaw of the MCC on his 20 20 proposals
item.itunes:summary: This week Times Cricket correspondent Mike Atherton on the England selection debacle we preview the Third Test against South Africa at Edgbaston and Keith Bradshaw of the MCC on his 20 20 proposals

item.title: Test Cricket Podcast 7 - Andrew Flintoff & John Emburey
item.itunes:author: Times Online
item.itunes:subtitle: For our final podcast Parick Kidd and the team debate the appointment of Kevin Pieterson as England captain and preview the fourth test with Andrew Flintoff
item.itunes:summary: For our final podcast Parick Kidd and the team debate the appointment of Kevin Pieterson as England captain and preview the fourth test with Andrew Flintoff
